summary: The document is a payroll certification report for the U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on Assassinations, dated April 6, 1977. It details the payroll for employees from March 1, 1977, to March 31, 1977, including their names, positions, social security numbers, pay schedules, annual salaries, and gross pay. It also includes remarks on terminations and changes in payroll. The document concludes with a certification that the listed employees have performed their official duties and have no relationship to a current member of Congress unless noted.
key_findings: The document provides a detailed payroll listing for the Select Committee on Assassinations for March 1977.
It includes information on terminations and payroll changes during the accounting period.
The certification at the end confirms the employees' performance of official duties and their lack of relationship to current members of Congress.
